function renderLine( line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c =="t" then set_stone("st-turnstile",i-1,line) elseif c == "n" then set_stone("st-turnstile-n",i-1,line) elseif c == "s" then set_stone("st-turnstile-s",i-1,line) elseif c == "r" then set_stone("st-rock7",i-1,line) elseif c == "S" then set_stone("st-swap",i-1,line) elseif c == "x" then set_stone("st-block",i-1,line) elseif c == "d" then set_stone("st-death",i-1,line) elseif c == "g" then set_stone("st-grate1",i-1,line) elseif c == "h" then set_item("it-hollow",i-1,line) elseif c == "W" then yy1( "white", i-1, line) elseif c == "B" then yy1( "black", i-1, line) elseif c == "f" then set_stone("st-fakeoxyd",i-1,line) elseif c == "o" then oxyd( i-1, line) elseif c == "#" then set_floor("fl-water",i-1,line) elseif c == "a" then set_actor("ac-blackball", i-.5,line+.5) set_item("it-yinyang", i-1, line+.5) elseif c == "b" then set_actor("ac-whiteball", i-.5,line+.5) set_item("it-yinyang", i-1, line+.5) end end end
function yy1( color, x, y) stone = format( "st-%s1", color) set_stone( stone, x, y) set_item("it-hollow", x, y) end
